Class CommThread<T extends ControllerProperty>

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.comm.CommThread<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClearGuideThread, CParkThread, DmsXmlThread, E6Thread, InfinovaThread, IpawsThread, NtcipThread
public class CommThread<T extends ControllerProperty> extends Object
CommThread represents a communication channel with priority-queued polling.
Author:
Douglas Lau, John L. Stanley - SRF Consulting

  • Constructor Details

    • CommThread

      public CommThread(ThreadedPoller<T> dp, OpQueue<T> q, URI s, String u, int rt, int nrd, DebugLog log)
      Create a new comm thread.
      Parameters:
      dp - The device poller.
      q - The operation queue.
      s - Default URI scheme.
      u - The URI.
      rt - Receive timeout (ms).
      nrd - No-response disconnect (sec).

    • createMessenger

      protected Messenger createMessenger(URI s, String u, int rt, int nrd) throws MessengerException, IOException
      Create a messenger.
      Parameters:
      s - Default URI scheme.
      u - The URI.
      rt - Receive timeout (ms).
      nrd - No-response disconnect (sec).
      Returns:
      The new messenger.
      Throws:
      MessengerException - if the messenger could not be created.
      IOException

    • createCommMessage

      protected CommMessage<T> createCommMessage(Messenger m, OpController<T> o) throws IOException
      Create a message for the specified operation.
      Parameters:
      m - The messenger.
      o - The operation.
      Returns:
      New comm message.
      Throws:
      IOException
